task_description: Create a fully automated migration script to update all hardcoded paths from /home/nomad to /home/devops across the VECTRA-PLAYER codebase. Script must handle 63 references across 22 files, create safety backups, verify directory structure, update environment configuration, and provide verification checks. Includes rollback capability and comprehensive logging.

patterns.path_handling: Use pathlib.Path for all path operations (see src/config.py get_data_config() method)
patterns.cli_pattern: Use argparse for command-line interface with boolean flags (see scripts/vectra_index.py main() function)
patterns.test_pattern: Use class-based pytest with descriptive test names (see src/tests/test_core/test_validators.py)
patterns.logging_pattern: Use Python logging module with both file and console handlers
patterns.backup_pattern: Use shutil.copy2 to preserve file metadata, create timestamped backup directories

existing_implementations.description: Found CLI pattern in scripts/vectra_index.py with argparse and Path manipulation. Config.py shows environment-based path configuration using Path.home() and environment variables.
